definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

pinyin: zhuan1 yong4 ji2 cheng2 dian4 lu4

sentences.english: This article introduces the methods of checking integrate circuit module and single crystal transistor.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了用萬用表檢測集成電路塊和單結晶體管的方法。

sentences.english: The company ' s primary business is IC component packaging and test and memory module assembly.
sentences.chinese: 公司的主要業務是集成電路封裝測試和內存模塊裝配。

sentences.english: A variation of LSI is called probabilistic latent semantic.
sentences.chinese: 集成電路是一種變異稱爲概率潛在語義。

sentences.english: Integrated circuits are fairly recent development.
sentences.chinese: 集成電路是近年來才發展起的。

sentences.english: The copper alloy strip of lead frame is the fundamental material for integrate circuit.
sentences.chinese: 引線框架用銅帶是集成電路的重要基礎材料。

sentences.english: Thermal management has emerged as a critical issue in the design of integrated circuits(ICs).
sentences.chinese: 熱控制是集成電路設計中需要解決的關鍵問題。

sentences.english: Digital designers will go so far as to unsympathetically say the same about analog-IC designers.
sentences.chinese: 數字設計師們也毫不留情地批評模擬集成電路設計師。

sentences.english: He has joint Fraunhofer Institute for Integrated Circiuts in Erlangen in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 此後加入德國夫琅霍夫集成電路研究所。

sentences.english: The latest development of Si-based power IC technology is summarized.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了硅功率集成電路技術的一些發展動態。

sentences.english: Very large-scale integration (VLSI) vastly increased circuit density, giving RisE to the microprocessor.
sentences.chinese: 大規模集成電路更大的增加了微處理器的電路密度。

sentences.english: Silicon devices are compatible with integrated-circuit technology.
sentences.chinese: 硅元件和集成電路技術是相容的。

sentences.english: Suitable for maintenance industry, reassembling soldering tin of integrated circuit.
sentences.chinese: 適用於維修行業集成電路的拆裝熔錫。

sentences.english: The theory of rectilinear embeddings of graphs has been used in the design of VLSI.
sentences.chinese: 縱橫嵌入的理論已被用在超大規模集成電路的設計中。

sentences.english: Gigabit serial interface integrated circuits play an important role in high speed serial I/O bus.
sentences.chinese: 高速的接口集成電路在串行連接系統中起着重要作用。

sentences.english: Design of BVR(bandgap voltage reference) used in the integrated circuit was described.
sentences.chinese: 設計了一種集成電路中帶隙電壓參考源。

sentences.english: This paper develops a three-phase SCR trigger circuit adopting the cur-rent integrated circuit.
sentences.chinese: 採用通用集成電路設計了一種三相可控硅觸發電路。

definition: industry chain (concept proposed by US scholar Michael Porter in 1985)
public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
